base_description: Modern silver faucet set with sleek design.
part_description: Consists of a curved central spout and two rectangular handles, symmetrically positioned on either side. The spout is tall and arching, while the handles are flat and horizontal.
internal_interaction_description: The central spout is connected to the handles through internal plumbing, allowing water flow control. The handles likely rotate or lift to adjust water temperature and pressure, directing it through the spout.
external_interaction_description: The faucet set is designed to be mounted on a sink or countertop. Users interact with the handles to control water flow, while the spout directs water into the basin. Compatible with various sink designs, enhancing modern bathroom or kitchen aesthetics.
